pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可预防的；可阻止的；可防止的
预期的；以前的；预防的；先行的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重因受到约束或阻碍而造成的行动困难。
语气较轻，多指阻碍、拖延人或事，强调使进展速度缓慢下来。
语气强烈，指有效堵住了通道，使人或物无法通过。
含义广泛，指采取预防措施或设置障碍去阻止某人或某事。
含义与block很接近，指阻塞通道或禁止出入，但有对暗示不用障碍物的阻止或禁止。
正式用词，语气强，多指以干扰或设置障碍的方式阻碍交通，使不能自由畅通。

bilingual.target: 它有助于防止侵蚀和洪水。

bilingual.source: The flat terraces catch the rainwater and prevent the soil from being washed away.
bilingual.target: 平坦的梯田接住雨水，防止土壤被冲走。

bilingual.source: Learning the bad parts may help prevent those kinds of things happening again.
bilingual.target: 学习坏的部分可能有助于防止这些事情再次发生。
缓冲区可以防止数据丢失。
使用防晒霜可以防止晒伤。
防晒霜可以帮助防止晒伤。
水印可以帮助防止伪造。

list.abstract: prevent，英文单词，作动词，翻译为预防、防止、妨碍等意思。

yingyinNormal.en: And no doubt to prevent their further interference. Well, that, too, of course.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无疑也是为了防止他们再做干涉，当然也有这个原因。

yingyinNormal.en: So now we assist our allies, in solving human conflicts. To prevent mankind from bringing harm to itself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我们帮助盟军，解决人类的冲突，防止人类伤害自己。

yingyinNormal.en: The main reason why I do this is to prevent the middle from ballooning too much and coming up too high because it will.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样做的主要目的是防止中间鼓起来，会变得很高，真的会这样。

yingyinNormal.en: What is to prevent, say, an uprising? That can lead to revolution. And then, in a fraction of time, the whole system collapses.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那该如何防止这种叛乱？那会引发一场革命，用不了多久，政府就会垮台。

yingyinNormal.en: When I did this, I was usually able to discover principles that would prevent me from repeating the same mistakes in the future. And I could see that being successful simply consisted of five steps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当我这么做的时候，我通常能够发现能在未来防止我重复同样错误的原则。我发现成功只有五个步骤。

yingyinNormal.en: The purpose of this war is to prevent all future wars.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这场战争的目的是为了杜绝未来的战争。

yingyinNormal.en: And what's gonna prevent you from accomplishing that? What are you afraid of?
yingyinNormal.zh: 要实现目标有什么阻力吗？有什么不敢做的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Not if we stop a war. Not if we can prevent Shaw. Not if we risk our lives doing so.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们制止了战争就不会，我们制止了萧，就不会；我们冒死这么做，就不会。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, how do you prevent eddy currents in a transformer? Laminate the core material.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你如何预防变压器中的涡流损耗？层压芯材。

yingyinNormal.en: Your sister did tell me that you would do anything in your power to prevent me from claiming my title.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你姐姐告诉我你会动用一切力量阻止我主张我的权利。

yingyinNormal.en: And she knew how to prevent it. Why else would you buy this book of instructions? Marie Stopes. Married Love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且她知道如何避孕，不然你为什么买这本指南呢？玛丽·斯特普 《夫妻之爱》。

yingyinNormal.en: And if something were to prevent you from doing your laundry on Saturday at 8:15, you might find it unpleasant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果因为某些事，周六晚上8点15分不能洗衣服，你会觉得不爽。

yingyinNormal.en: Cover up your bowl and what that will do is prevent the air from drying out the crust on that and actually prevents it from growing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用保鲜膜把碗盖起来，这样不会让空气进入碗里，把面团的表皮风干了，那样面就不能醒了。

yingyinNormal.en: And if a girl from District 12 of all places can defy The Capitol and walk away unharmed, what is to prevent them from doing the same?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果一个来自12区这种地方的小姑娘都可以在挑衅国会区后安然无恙，如何阻止其他区效仿？

yingyinNormal.en: Although the country does have these terrible things to deal with, we've made a progress and we are trying to prevent these happening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽管这个国家确实仍有很多不如人意的地方，我们已经取得了很大的进步，我们也在尽力阻止这类事情发生。

yingyinNormal.en: Captain, I cannot imagine what you must be feeling right now, but if are to prevent a second attack, we need to send you back immediately.
yingyinNormal.zh: 上尉，我不能体会你现在的心情，但我们必须马上送你回去阻止第二场爆炸。

yingyinNormal.en: Not only because they prevent deforestation, but they actually use less energy and have a lower carbon emission once everything is taken into account.
yingyinNormal.zh: 把所有事情考虑进去的话，使用烘手机，不只可以减少森林砍筏，还可以减少能源消耗，降低碳排放量。

yingyinNormal.en: In more than a decade of war, this 9/11 Generation has worked with the Afghan people to help them reclaim their communities and prevent terrorist attacks against our own country.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在10多年的战争中，这9/11的一代人和阿富汗人民一道帮助他们改造他们的社会，并阻止针对我们自己国家的恐怖袭击。

yingyinNormal.en: Anyway, the update should prevent any further voices, but you will let me know if any of the hosts display or exhibit any unusual behavior, won't you, Bernard? Yes, of course. Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 总之，程序升级应该能阻止一切幻听了，但是如果有任何接待员有异常表现，都要告诉我，伯纳德。好的，当然了。好。

yingyinNormal.en: When I refer to your ego barrier, I'm talking about the parts of your brain that prevent you from acknowledging your weaknesses objectively, so that you can figure out how to deal with them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说到自负障碍，我指的是你大脑的某些部分阻止你客观地承认自己的弱点，让你无法想出解决办法。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 防止；阻挡；预防；妨碍

word_family.mean: v. 妨碍；制止；引领；阻止；阻挡

sense_info_list.en: keep something from happening or arising

examination_example.sentence: This suggests the possibility that lifestyle factors might help <highlight>prevent</highlight> or delay this type of decline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这表明一种可能性，即生活方式的因素可能有助于预防或者推迟这种类型的衰退。

examination_example.sentence: Tech multinationals' monopoly should be <highlight>prevented</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科技跨国公司的垄断应该被阻止。

examination_example.sentence: But if Congress wanted to <highlight>prevent</highlight> states from using their own resources to check immigration status, it could.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果国会想要阻止各州通过自己的资源核实移民身份，它确实可以做到。

word_usage.usage: prevent sb. from doing sth. 表示“阻止某人做某事”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 预防的；防止的；防病的
n. 防止；阻挡；预防；妨碍
adj. 可阻止的；可预防的；可防止的

word_family.mean: v. 妨碍；制止；引领；阻止；阻挡

sense_info_list.en: keep something from happening or arising

examination_example.sentence: Not all casualties can necessarily be <highlight>prevented</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 并不是所有的伤亡都可以避免。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>prevent</highlight> that event from becoming a catastrophe, first responders will join members of the public in rehearsals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了防止该事件成为灾难，第一响应者将与公众进行演习。

examination_example.sentence: For now, the U.S. government is more focused on <highlight>preventing</highlight> new debris from forming than taking the trash out of orbit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前，与将垃圾带出轨道相比，美国政府更注重防止新碎片的形成。

examination_example.sentence: For years, nutritionists have recommended that pasta be kept to a minimum, to cut calories, <highlight>prevent</highlight> fat build-up and stop blood sugar shooting up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，营养学家一直建议尽量少吃意大利面，以减少卡路里，防止脂肪堆积并阻止血糖上升。

examination_example.sentence: They want to make their customers interested in preserving their products and <highlight>preventing</highlight> things that still have value from going to the garbage dump.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些服装类、鞋类、电子产业类的零售商和生产商旨在让他们的消费者注意对产品的保护，防止商品还没真正用完就丢掉，造成浪费。

examination_example.sentence: A company raised the snails for fresh-water aquariums (水族馆), but failed to <highlight>prevent</highlight> their escape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这家公司原本是为淡水水族馆饲养这些螺产品，但却未能防止其逃窜。

examination_example.sentence: Behove says experts are investigating how to control the pest's damage and <highlight>prevent</highlight> its spread, which has gone largely unchecked until now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Behove 说，专家们正在研究如何控制害虫的危害性并防止其扩散，到目前为止，这种危害尚未得到有效的控制。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 预防的；防止的；防病的
n. 防止；阻挡；预防；妨碍

word_family.mean: v. 妨碍；制止；引领；阻止；阻挡

sense_info_list.en: keep something from happening or arising

examination_example.sentence: Although the pressure of the cabin is adjusted to <highlight>prevent</highlight> altitude sickness, you could still experience sleepiness or a headache.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管已调整了机舱压力以防止高原反应，但你仍可能会感到困倦或头痛。

examination_example.sentence: To help <highlight>prevent</highlight> headaches, drink plenty of water, and avoid alcohol and coffee.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了防止头痛，请多喝水，避免喝酒和咖啡。

examination_example.sentence: Offering support services to spouses caring for their other halves may reduce marital stress and <highlight>prevent</highlight> divorce at older ages.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为照顾自己另一半的已婚人士提供支持服务，可能会减轻婚姻压力，防止老年夫妻离婚。

examination_example.sentence: By prescribing nutritional changes or launching programs such as ‘ Shop with your Doc, they are trying to <highlight>prevent</highlight>, limit or even reverse disease by changing what patients eat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过规定营养变化或推出“与您的医生一起购物”之类的计划，他们正试图通过改变患者的饮食来预防，限制甚至逆转疾病。

examination_example.sentence: The lifestyle medicine specialty is designed to train doctors in how to <highlight>prevent</highlight> and treat disease, in part, by changing patients nutritional habits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生活方式医学专业旨在培训医生如何在一定程度上通过改变患者的营养习惯来预防和治疗疾病。

examination_example.sentence: There's no question people can take things a long way toward reversing diabetes, reversing high blood pressure, even <highlight>preventing</highlight> cancer by food choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，人们在通过事物选择来逆转糖尿病、逆转高血压，甚至预防癌症方还有很长的路要走。

word_usage.usage:
prevent后跟名词或代词作宾语，在宾语后可跟from doing, from可以省略。from省略后，prevent的宾语可演变为动名词的逻辑主语，所以prevent sb. (from) doing和prevent sb./sb.’s doing都对：
Nobody could prevent him/his returning home from the USA.
没人能阻止他从美国回到祖国。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 防止；阻挡；预防；妨碍
adj. 可阻止的；可预防的；可防止的

word_family.mean: v. 妨碍；制止；引领；阻止；阻挡

sense_info_list.en: keep something from happening or arising

examination_example.sentence: This will <highlight>prevent</highlight> you from getting lost in the first few days of classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将防止你在上课的头几天迷路。

examination_example.sentence: If you like, a squeeze of fresh lemon juice on the bananas will <highlight>prevent</highlight> them turning brown.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你愿意，在香蕉上挤一点新鲜的柠檬汁可以防止香蕉变成褐色。

examination_example.sentence: The fats in fish are thought to help <highlight>prevent</highlight> heart disease.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鱼中的脂肪被认为有助于预防心脏病。

prevent后跟名词或代词作宾语，在宾语后可跟from doing, from可以省略。from省略后，prevent的宾语可演变为动名词的逻辑主语，所以prevent sb. (from) doing和prevent sb./sb.’s doing都对：
Nobody could prevent him/his returning home from the USA.
没人能阻止他从美国回到祖国。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 防止；阻挡；预防；妨碍

word_family.mean: v. 妨碍；制止；引领；阻止；阻挡

examination_example.sentence: Green tea can <highlight>prevent</highlight> heart disease, obesity and cancer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绿茶可以预防心脏病、肥胖症和癌症。

examination_example.sentence: They might <highlight>prevent</highlight> children getting extra money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能会阻止孩子们获得额外的钱。

examination_example.sentence: A healthy life style can help <highlight>prevent</highlight> diabetes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 健康的生活方式有助于预防糖尿病。
